description: Chocolate and marshmallows in a toasty warm cookie? Sign right up for this easy afternoon-tea recipe.
name: Hot-Chocolate Cookies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Reserve 4 pieces of chocolate. Break remaining chocolate into pieces. Place chopped chocolate and butter in a large microwave-safe bowl. Microwave on high in 30-second increments, stirring in between, until melted.

Add chocolate, drinking chocolate, baking powder, salt, vanilla and eggs to a large bowl. Mix until thoroughly combined. Cover and refrigerate for 1 hour. Preheat oven to 190°C/170°C fan-forced. Line a large baking tray with baking paper.

Roll 2 tbs of mixture at a time into balls and place on the prepared tray, allowing room for spreading. Bake for 10 minutes or until cookies are puffed and beginning to crack. Working quickly, remove trays from the oven and top each cookie with a piece of marshmallow. Bake for a further 2 minutes or until cookies are shiny but soft in the centre and marshmallows have melted slightly.
Finely chop reserved chocolate and sprinkle over marshmallows. Stand for 5 minutes or until firm. Serve warm.
